c1.name: Named Juvenile Casebook
c1.descriptionRaw: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for <color=#FFD780FF>Heartstopper Strike</color>. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.
c1.description: For 5s after Shikanoin Heizou takes the field, his Normal Attack SPD is increased by 15%. He also gains 1 Declension stack for Heartstopper Strike. This effect can be triggered once every 10s.

c2.name: Investigative Collection
c2.descriptionRaw: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by <color=#FFD780FF>Windmuster Kick</color> is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.
c2.description: The pull effect of the Arresting Windtunnel created by Windmuster Kick is enhanced, and its duration is increased to 1s.

c3.name: Esoteric Puzzle Book
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Heartstopper Strike</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Heartstopper Strike by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Tome of Lies
c4.descriptionRaw:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each <color=#FFD780FF>Windmuster Kick</color> will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that Windmuster Kick will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One <color=#FFD780FF>Windmuster Kick</color> can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.
c4.description:
The first Windmuster Iris explosion in each Windmuster Kick will regenerate 9 Elemental Energy for Shikanoin Heizou. Every subsequent explosion in that Windmuster Kick will each regenerate an additional 1.5 Energy for Heizou.
One Windmuster Kick can regenerate a total of 13.5 Energy for Heizou in this manner.

c5.name: Secret Archive
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Windmuster Kick</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Windmuster Kick by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Curious Casefiles
c6.descriptionRaw: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the <color=#FFD780FF>Heartstopper Strike</color> unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this Heartstopper Strike's CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.
c6.description: Each Declension stack will increase the CRIT Rate of the Heartstopper Strike unleashed by 4%. When Heizou possesses Conviction, this Heartstopper Strike's CRIT DMG is increased by 32%.
